container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Must be 2-63 lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start or end with a hyphen.

aws_access_key_id.title: AWS Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: Your AWS Access Key ID for S3 access.

aws_secret_access_key.title: AWS Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: Your AWS Secret Access Key for S3 access.

aws_region.title: AWS Region
aws_region.description: The AWS region where your S3 bucket is located.

aws_endpoint_url.title: AWS Endpoint URL
aws_endpoint_url.description: The endpoint URL for your S3 bucket, if using a custom endpoint.

salad_project.title: Salad Project
salad_project.description: The Salad project to use for this worker.
